holistic_ikigai_analysis.methodology: 3-phase comprehensive analysis using full context windows
holistic_ikigai_analysis.primary_ikigai: Creating calm and continuity by keeping digital identity secure and everyday tools reliable
secondary_areas: Pragmatic, utility-first use of the Microsoft productivity ecosystem

supporting_evidence.pattern: Proactive attention to account security and sign-in monitoring
examples: New sign-in detected for your Microsoft account

supporting_evidence.pattern: Reliance on mainstream, established platforms for daily operations

examples: Security alert accepted over promotional content

framework_dimensions.external_connection: Connects to the world through trusted, mainstream platforms; anchors participation online in a sense of safety and continuity.
framework_dimensions.active_engagement: Primarily passive and habitual; engages when prompted by security events rather than exploratory outreach.
framework_dimensions.emotional_meaning: Derives reassurance and quiet satisfaction from order, safety, and tools working without disruption.
framework_dimensions.voluntary_pursuit: Mixed; alerts are externally triggered, yet consistent acceptance indicates a chosen priority for digital safety.
framework_dimensions.everyday_joy: Micro-joys from cleared security notifications, smooth sign-ins, and a stable, frictionless toolset.
framework_dimensions.growth_orientation: Inclined toward incremental improvements in security hygiene and reliability; potential to deepen routines and automations.

indicators: Reflects maintenance of security infrastructure rather than elective content
Engagement tied to platform use rather than chosen subscriptions

value_indicators: Baseline prioritization of account safety (acceptance of security notifications)
Reliance on established platforms for daily operations
Pragmatism over novelty (utility communications over promotional content in this sample)
confidence_factors: Content not available; system-generated nature reflects platform use more than autonomous preference expression
Single email (security alert) provides minimal signal and limited evidence of chosen interests

recommendations: Establish a weekly 10-minute security check (review sign-in logs, update recovery info, verify devices).
Enable/verify multifactor authentication with Microsoft Authenticator and store recovery codes securely.
Adopt a password manager and transition key accounts to passkeys where supported.
Create a simple 'digital control panel' (links to Microsoft Account Security, device list, OneDrive status) for quick status checks.
Automate hygiene: inbox rules to flag security alerts, periodic device health reminders, and sign-out of inactive devices.
Iterate one pragmatic productivity upgrade at a time (e.g., Windows Hello, OneDrive Known Folder Move, Focus Sessions) to reduce friction.
Track a minimal metric of calm (e.g., zero unresolved security alerts per week) to reinforce the daily value of digital order.

methodology_details.phase_1: Holistic overview analysis across all emails to extract themes and patterns
methodology_details.phase_2: Contextual per-email scoring using holistic insights
methodology_details.phase_3: Synthesis and validation for comprehensive ikigai profile
methodology_details.context_window_optimization: Adaptive batching based on model capabilities
methodology_details.inclusive_approach: Analyzes ALL email types including commercial for complete picture
